See attachment1 on what I get on my runtime workbench:  The log view looks ok.

============================
In the LogCorrelatorProject\readme.html, Step 4 says: 

4.	Import the syslog2.log file using the Simple Parser V1.0.

I already ran the LogParser sample, so I already have a syslog1.log in my 
runtime workbench.  I get the window shown in second attachment.

What do I choose?  The readme can be improved by saying which bullet to 
choose.  I chose Replace existing log file.  I got the same import error 
stated above.  After closing the error window, and following the remaining 
steps in the readme, I saw the UML2 sequence diagram.

Also, the setUserInput() API on the MyParser class is never invoked.
Update the How to create a parser and a correlation engine using the plug-in 
interfaces docuemnation 
(http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/indextools.cgi/~checkout~/hyades-
home/docs/ParserCorrelation.html) based on the changes to the log parser 
interfaces.
Using the Hyades v3.2.1 driver (20050301_1749 build), the exception is not 
thrown when importing the syslog1.log.

The setUserInput() method has since been changed to the setConfiguration() 
method.  As such, the MyParser.java class has been modified and checked-in to 
Haydes 3.3 (HEAD) and TPTP 4.0 (HEAD) on March 8, 2005.

The readme.html file for the Log Correlation sample has been modified to better 
explain the sample scenario.  As such, the readme.html file has been modified 
and checked-in to Haydes 3.3 (HEAD) and TPTP 4.0 (HEAD) on March 8, 2005.

Opening another defect for updating the 'How to create a parser and a 
correlation engine using the plug-in 
interfaces docuemnation' 
(http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/indextools.cgi/~checkout~/hyades-
home/docs/ParserCorrelation.html).
